After an introduction into conducting academic research, the course will be tailored to the research interests of students. Students will learn about different methodologies, for example, media studies, gender studies, narratology, fan culture.

Session 2-14: Presentations and discussions of methodologies and research progress

Session 15: Discussion of progress
Session 16-28: Presentations and discussions of methodologies and research progress

Final draft deadline: December 9.
